clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text:
In the past 12 months, we have collected but have not disclosed to third parties for our business purposes, the following categories of Personal Information relating to California residents covered by this disclosure:

  • Identifiers, such as name and email.
  • Personal information, as defined in the California safeguards law, such as contact information
  • Internet or network activity information, such as browsing history and interactions with our website.
  • Geolocation data, such as device location and Internet Protocol (IP) location.
  • Inferences drawn from any of the Personal Information listed above to create a profile about, for example, an individual’s preferences and characteristics.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
Cookies and Usage Data.

Place of processing: United States – Privacy Policy – Opt Out. Privacy Shield participant.

Google AdWords conversion tracking (Google Inc.)

Google AdWords conversion tracking is an analytics service provided by Google Inc. that connects data from the Google AdWords advertising network with actions performed on this Application.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text: Personal Data collected: city, company name, country, date of birth, email address, first name, gender and last name.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to
modify, suspend, restrict, or discontinue your access and use of the Site or
any part thereof.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: PLEASE NOTE THAT THESE TERMS INCLUDE AN ARBITRATION PROVISION, WHICH YOU WILL BE BOUND TO BY USING AND ACCESSING OUR SITE.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
By continuing to our Site, you hereby consent
to any such changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "Use of Personal Information In the past 12 months, we have used Personal Information relating to California residents to operate, manage, and maintain our business, to provide our products and services, and to accomplish our business purposes and objectives, including the following:  Performing services, including maintaining or servicing accounts, providing customer service, processing or fulfilling orders and transactions, verifying customer information, processing payments, providing advertising or marketing services"

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Also: "providing advertising or marketing services"

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: Full quote: "Use of Personal Information In the past 12 months, we have used Personal Information relating to California residents to operate, manage, and maintain our business, to provide our products and services, and to accomplish our business purposes and objectives, including the following:  Performing services, including maintaining or servicing accounts, providing customer service, processing or fulfilling orders and transactions, verifying customer information, processing payments, providing advertising or marketing services"

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text:
Analytics

The services contained in this section enable the Owner to monitor and analyze web traffic and can be used to keep track of User behavior.

Google Analytics with anonymized IP (Google Inc.)

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (California, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: This Agreement shall be governed and interpreted under the laws of the State of California.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: In the past 12 months, we have not “sold” Personal Information subject to the CCPA

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Updated June  15, 2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right to terminate, suspend, change, or restrict access to all or any part of our Site without notice or liability.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: You must create an account to use this service
clauses.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it
clauses.clause_text: To access and use our Site, you may be required to complete a registration with us.

case.text: You must create an account to use this service

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
You may not use the Site if:
(1) you are not of legal age or capacity to entering into a binding agreement
with us unless you have approval of a guardian,

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text:
The activities or items prohibited
include, but are not limited to: violations of local state or federal law

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Users are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed, but it makes sense for the purposes of this service.
clauses.clause_text:
You will not register with a pseudonym,
false identity, avatar, or false image.

case.text: You are not allowed to use pseudonyms, as trust and transparency between users regarding their identities is relevant to the service.

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text:
You acknowledge and agree that you are solely responsible for
maintaining the security of the devices you may use to access the Site.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: This Application does not support “Do Not Track” requests.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right to amend, modify, or and/change
these Terms at any time and without prior notice.
If we decide to change our
Terms, we will conspicuously post a link to the updated Terms in places on our
website that we deem appropriate.

case.text: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
